relnotes.name: Web Recognisers
relnotes.purpose: Web URL and bookmark recognizers, plugins to the MIME recognizer Framework. Each recognizer is a Symbian OS Application Architecture compliant recognition model.

defect.title: TRUE - Active notes are received as zip when sent using bluetooth and it is not

relnotes.defect: Implementation done as per BR2505.2, In case of files with out extension and having more than 3 html tags confidence level will be returned as EProbable.
relnotes.preq: Phase-I of Preq-1182 GNU Make-based build system, Filename Policy check updations
